Baytown.Fred Hartman Bridge: The Fred Hartman Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge in the U.S. state of Texas, spanning the Houston Ship Channel. The bridge carries 2.6 miles (4 km) of State Highway 146, between the cities of Baytown and La Porte  (east of Houston). It is expected to carry State Highway 99, the Grand Parkway when it is completed around Houston.
